Name: LU 18 - Zoning, 1417 Avenue U Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 250333 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 250333 ZRK (1417 Avenue U Rezoning) submitted by 1417 Avenue U Holding LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 48.

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
